Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, east of the Shrine of Gruumsh.
Room.LongDescription: The Orcs have built a large shrine in dedication to Gruumsh, the orc god of all that is and will be. He is said to rule over the other orcish gods with an iron fist and never sleeps. Gruumsh is not a very friendly god, but when you're omnipotent, it doesn't really matter.
